about_the_game:
We expect to launch a demo before December 2023 ends, so you can try the game, meanwhile, add it to your wishlist and check out our

In Gossip and Potions, immerse yourself in potion creation and the magic that emanates from your cauldron, while wrapping yourself in the fascinating narratives of various characters and their gossip – I mean, serious problems to solve.

Be the master of your own fate and that of others too. You have the choice to either help or complicate life for your customers – What a service.

Face the fallout of your choices, every decision will leave a mark on the outcomes of the intriguing stories unfolding before your eyes.


  • Brace yourself to confront dramatic and, at times, uncomfortable circumstances that challenge your wit and magical skills. The intrigues range from poignant, heartbreaking plots to scenarios filled with humor and unusual situations where your decisions make a REAL difference.
  • Master the complex art of magic, mastering the delicacy of blending, the precision of grinding, and the knack for brewing.
  • Handle various ingredients just like any genuine witch, buying them from the wandering merchant and shrewdly haggling to save every coin, or, if you prefer, grow your own.


Put on your witch's hat and enter the enchanting world of Gossip and Potions.
